abstract: International Energy Agency says huge downward revisions to oil production in Brazil and Iraq increase prospects of lean oil markets.
lead_paragraph: The International Energy Agency said sharp downward revisions in oil output in Brazil and Iraq may lead to tighter oil markets.

headline.main: Output Cuts in Brazil and Iraq Augur Risks of Oil Shortage
headline.print_headline: Output Cuts in Brazil and Iraq Augur Risks of Oil Shortage

snippet: The International Energy Agency said sharp downward revisions in oil output in Brazil and Iraq may lead to tighter oil markets.
